Available Globally.name: Get Join Code
Available Globally.description: Gets the selected users Destiny 2 join code, like /join Name#1234

Only Available in the Descend Server.name: Add Emoji
Only Available in the Descend Server.description: Add the selected image to the guild as an emoji

Only Available in the Descend Server.name: Draw Giveaway Winner
Only Available in the Descend Server.description: Close the giveaway and draw a winner from the giveaway. Use multiple times if you want multiple winners
